input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Slim Hinged Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Kingswood Fir Pencil Hinged Tree'
  - Name='Northlight Pre-Lit Pencil Northern Balsam Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Costway 6/7 Feet Artificial Christmas Tree Hinged Full Fir'
  - Name='National Tree Company First Traditions 7.5' Pre-Lit LED Slim Virginia Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Perry Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight 9.5 ft. Pre-Lit Medium Buffalo Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Premium Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree w/ Easy Assembly'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Premium Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree w/ Easy Assembly'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 3' Christmas Tree with Burlap Bag & Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7' Pre-Lit LED Slim Kingswood Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Dual Color Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 4 ft. Canadian Grande Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6 ft. Pre-Lit Acacia Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Natural Fraser Slim Fir Tree Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Kingswood Fir Hinged Pencil Tree with 150 Multi Lights'
  - Name='Northlight 14' Northern Pine Full Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Berkshire Mountain Fir Traditional 4.5 ft Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Feel-Real Tiffany Fir Slim Hinged Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 7.5-ft. Douglas Fir Downswept 800-Light Artificial Christmas Tree, Green'
  - Name='Full Alaskan Fir 7.5ft Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='Northlight 6.5' Layered Noble Fir Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill 12" Gray Woven Tree Collar'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Slim Hinged Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and product line (Dunhill Fir), also hinged construction, but described as slim rather than full body, so very similar but slightly different silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Kingswood Fir Pencil Hinged Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and hinged branch construction but a different fir type (Kingswood Fir) and 'pencil' (slim) silhouette rather than full body.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Pre-Lit Pencil Northern Balsam Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pre-lit and artificial Christmas tree features but different brand, slim silhouette, and a different fir type (Northern Balsam Fir).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway 6/7 Feet Artificial Christmas Tree Hinged Full Fir
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar size, hinged full fir tree construction, but different brand and no specific fir species mentioned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company First Traditions 7.5' Pre-Lit LED Slim Virginia Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pre-lit slim tree, but different tree species (Virginia Pine), different silhouette, and larger height.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Perry Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pre-lit artificial tree, but Perry is likely a different style/species with no mention of hinged branches or fir type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight 9.5 ft. Pre-Lit Medium Buffalo Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar pre-lit fir tree but different brand, taller height, and medium rather than full or slim silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Premium Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree w/ Easy Assembly
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and species (spruce), but similar easy assembly artificial Christmas tree concept.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Premium Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree w/ Easy Assembly
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different brand and species (spruce), but similar easy assembly artificial Christmas tree concept.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Premium Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree w/ Easy Assembly
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate entry; same reasoning applies as above.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Premium Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree w/ Easy Assembly
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate entry; same reasoning applies as above.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 3' Christmas Tree with Burlap Bag & Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much smaller size (3'), different brand, more novelty or tabletop style rather than full height tree like Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7' Pre-Lit LED Slim Kingswood Fir Artificial Christmas Tree Dual Color Lights

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 4 ft. Canadian Grande Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and Canadian Grande Fir species, but smaller height and unspecified if hinged branches.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6 ft. Pre-Lit Acacia Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and height, pre-lit, but different tree species (Acacia), which is less traditional fir type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Natural Fraser Slim Fir Tree Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and slim fir tree with lights, but different fir type (Fraser) and slimmer shape.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Not a tree; this is a tree collar accessory, so not relevant as a competitor product.
